stops.title: Liberty Bridge — Falls Park Entrance
stops.description: Welcome to the Liberty Bridge overlooking Falls Park. Placeholder: Introduce Greenville's renaissance, the bridge's design, and how this tour works.

stops.title: Reedy River Falls and Old Mill Ruins
stops.description: Face the waterfall from the lower path and explore the nearby brick and stone remnants. Placeholder: Textile era to park restoration; environmental cleanup, cotton mills, industry, and the Reedy's working past.

stops.title: West End Historic District Gateway
stops.description: Transition from river park to Main Street. Placeholder: Revitalization of the West End and adaptive reuse.

stops.title: Peace Center Plaza
stops.description: Stand near the plaza fountains. Placeholder: From warehouse district to performing arts hub; cultural heartbeat of Greenville.

stops.title: Shoeless Joe Jackson Statue
stops.description: At S Main & Augusta. Placeholder: Joe Jackson's early life, baseball stardom, and local legacy.

stops.title: Wyche Pavilion
stops.description: Open-air brick pavilion on the river. Placeholder: Carriage factory history and community events today.

stops.title: Historic Main Street — One City Plaza
stops.description: Pedestrian-friendly Main Street. Placeholder: Urban design decisions, shade trees, local businesses, and plazas.

stops.title: Old County Courthouse / Poinsett Hotel View
stops.description: Corner of Main & Court Streets. Placeholder: Poinsett Hotel's legacy and civic architecture around Court Street.

stops.title: Falls Park Gardens (Closing Stop)
stops.description: Near the bridge entrance in the gardens. Placeholder: Recap Greenville's transformation and invite further exploration.
